sentences.en: ...pests like aphids which infest cereal crops.
sentences.cn: …像蚜虫那样大肆侵害谷类作物的害虫。

sentences.en: A lame cat is better than a swift horse when rats infest the palace.
sentences.cn: 宫殿有鼠患,瘸猫比快马强.

sentences.en: Mosquitoes and insects infest the damp area.
Several animals in sea water can infest wood.
sentences.cn: 海水中有好多动物能侵害木材.

sentences.en: They set gigantic drone robots loose over the planet and then infest it with organic monsters.
sentences.cn: 五面怪安插巨型机器人于塞伯坦星上,以作骚扰.

sentences.en: Vermin infest their youth, and fortunes must be spent for curative powders.
sentences.cn: 害虫侵扰他们的青春和财富必须为治疗粉花.

sentences.en: Watch out for fleas and ticks that may infest your pet.
sentences.cn: 密切注意是否有跳蚤在宠物身上.温热的天气给跳蚤提供了很好的生存环境.

trans.tran_cn: 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生
trans.tran_en: if insects, rats etc infest a place, there are a lot of them and they usually cause damage

trans.tran_cn: 大批出没，成群出现，在…上寄生，寄生于，骚扰
trans.tran_en: if insects, rats etc infest a place, there are a lot of them and they usually cause damage
